snippet: A top aide to Mitt Romney said that the campaign obtained "several years" of income tax returns from potential running mates - suggesting that Paul Ryan had produced tax returns for a greater number of years than Mr. Romney.
abstract: A top aide to Mitt Romney said that the campaign obtained "several years" of income tax returns from potential running mates - suggesting that Paul Ryan had produced tax returns for a greater number of years than Mr. Romney.

headline.main: Romney Team Hints at More Openness on Ryan's Tax Records
